title: sooo i messed up, how can i change this?
body: I just played a match, and i was morgana mid and i was vsing a Sol mid, and when i stunned him his stars where not going away, i was 90% sure that it was all cc what made his stars go away, and also he used his e to break free from my stun, i have looked up the fact that his stars didn't go away, and i watched videos of this happening again and again, so it just doesn't affect his stars, and i was wrong, the useing the e to break free from my stun is still a little iffy in my mind, solely because in the videos i watch that never happened. never the less i did report him for useing a 3rd party program, and i now want to take that back, is there away, or am i just an a-hole forever?

replies.body:
Morgana's Dark Binding is actually a *snare* and not a *stun*. The key difference here is that while *snared*, you can still use abilities and spells, however, a *stun* prevents all action from being taken. What likely happened is that you *snared* them with a dark binding, then they used Comet of Legend while in your *snare* and took off once the *snare* ended. Also, a snare will not take away their stars, but a stun will. 

*Reixis* is correct, we typically won't punish a player off a single report, so there's not much to worry about there. I hope this cleared the situation up for you. Please let me know if you have any questions.

Youll be fine. More than likely, unless he was reported by a ton of people over the course of multiple games, they wont really look into it. (With all them un-intentionally feeding reports :P) Im pretty sure his E doesnt break stuns, maybe you mis-counted the seconds or something to that nature, ya know? You cant revoke that report. No way, no how. But theres no reason to ponder on it.

it was done instantly after i hit him witch is why it was super super weird to me, but it was just the one time so a report not super necessary for that one. and it most likely wont get him in any trouble like you said i just feel like a grade A  a-hole is all, im Canadian, i cant help it XD but good to know to look things up before i report
